title: The Zen of Bonsai
desc: Experience the calming effect of trimming bonsai—where mindfulness meets miniature forests. Let every snip be a step toward serenity.

title: Create a Jungle Vibe
desc: Bring tropical forests indoors with Monstera, Palm, and Calatheas. Dense foliage transforms your space into a tranquil rainforest retreat.

title: Minimalist Succulent Aesthetic
desc: Perfectly geometric, low-maintenance, and endlessly aesthetic—succulents bring calm to cluttered corners with pure simplicity.

title: Windowsill Herb Haven
desc: Turn your kitchen window into a living shelf of aroma. Fresh basil, mint, and rosemary at your fingertips—practical meets beautiful.

title: Trailing Elegance
desc: Let pothos, string of hearts, and ivy cascade like green waterfalls. Hanging plants add depth and drama to every indoor setting.

title: Statement Leaf Life
desc: Plants like fiddle leaf figs and bird of paradise are more than greenery—they’re interior design icons that breathe life into your aesthetic.
